|  --- | --- |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [FirebaseAccessToken](./firebase-admin.firebaseaccesstoken.md) | Type representing a Firebase OAuth access token (derived from a Google OAuth2 access token) which can be used to authenticate to Firebase services such as the Realtime Database and Auth. |
